name: Charm of War
storyline: Long time ago, centuries ago, the legendary city of Kyiage, the capital of a great state, was captured by cruel hordes of evil. The great magicians ruling the country in response to this attack used their powers and turned the entire city into a huge lake, condemning the invaders and themselves to death. However, it soon turned out that this sacrifice was in vain, although the people survived, but the country disintegrated into a series of smaller, conflicting states and a dark period in the history of the kingdom began.
summary: Russian action RPG Talisman. The game is based on ancient Slavic legends and tales, which means that travelers looking for the missing hail Kiyage, will meet foresters, mermaids, old witches and evil sorcerers. One of the four inhabitants of the world must save people from an unprecedented dash, and if this requires destroying everything around them, the game allows it.
